entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1 except minus 3 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1 except minus 3 inland. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
